source_documents.type: Statement of Undisputed Facts - Edwards case
Sloman defense of Acosta plea deal

palm_beach_police.lead_detective: Joseph Recarey - Field investigator, compiled incident reports
palm_beach_police.significance: Police built airtight case, frustrated when federal prosecutors accepted plea deal

fbi_agents.nesbitt_kuyrkendall: Special Agent E. Nesbitt Kuyrkendall - Lead FBI agent on case
fbi_agents.jason_richards: Special Agent Jason Richards - FBI investigator
fbi_agents.significance: FBI identified 40+ victims, traveled to NY and NM to interview others

doj_officials.sloman: Jeffrey H. Sloman - First Assistant US Attorney under Acosta, defended NPA
doj_officials.atkinson: Karen Atkinson - Supervisor of AUSA Villafaña
doj_officials.fisher: Alice Fisher - Assistant Attorney General (DOJ CEOS)
doj_officials.barr: William Barr - AG nominee pledged to investigate handling of case (2019)

victim_attorneys.edwards: Bradley J. Edwards - Key victims' attorney, filed CVRA lawsuit 2008
victim_attorneys.cassell: Paul Cassell - Filed Crime Victims Rights Act lawsuit

key_revelations.53_page_indictment: Federal prosecutors had prepared 53-page indictment and 82-page prosecution memo
key_revelations.40_victims: FBI had identified nearly 40 victims at time of NPA
key_revelations.secret_deal: NPA was sealed from public view, victims not notified as required by CVRA
key_revelations.marriott_meeting: Acosta met privately with Lefkowitz at Marriott hotel where he agreed to keep deal secret

new_entities_discovered.name: Michael Reiter
new_entities_discovered.role: Palm Beach Police Chief who led 2005-2006 investigation into Epstein. Built comprehensive case, frustrated by NPA outcome.

new_entities_discovered.name: Joseph Recarey
new_entities_discovered.role: Palm Beach Police Detective. Lead field investigator who compiled detailed incident reports documenting Epstein's crimes.

new_entities_discovered.name: E. Nesbitt Kuyrkendall
new_entities_discovered.role: FBI Special Agent. Lead FBI agent on Epstein investigation.

new_entities_discovered.name: Jason Richards
new_entities_discovered.role: FBI Special Agent on Epstein case.

new_entities_discovered.name: Jeffrey H. Sloman
new_entities_discovered.role: First Assistant US Attorney under Acosta. Defended NPA in 2019 opinion piece.

new_entities_discovered.name: Karen Atkinson
new_entities_discovered.role: DOJ supervisor of AUSA Villafaña on Epstein case.

new_entities_discovered.name: Bradley J. Edwards
new_entities_discovered.role: Victims' attorney who represented L.M., E.W., and Jane Doe. Filed CVRA lawsuit 2008.

new_entities_discovered.name: Paul Cassell
new_entities_discovered.role: Attorney who filed Crime Victims Rights Act lawsuit on behalf of victims.
